msgs.text:
Build your own Lightning ATM DIY
https://docs.lightningatm.me/
More ATM types: https://stacker.news/items/102229

HOME MINING: Home mining strategy https://www.econoalchemist.com/post/home-mining-for-non-kyc-bitcoin Mine with an S9 to heat apartment https://twitter.com/BTCDeathStar2/status/1576874700390961152?s=20&t=w85_bEy5A3eIG9lKCwhpvw Plug and play home mining with the apollo machine built by FutureBit. 1-2 terra hash/s https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iXICulaZYrg Hashing with cooking oil https://twitter.com/lylepratt/status/1568966447790964738?t=nffg2O1MRQcumxMu1BqArA&s=19 .8 hashes per second on a gameboy https://twitter.com/HeroOfBitcoin/status/1565124808203030534?t=W3ZX1K4sds6mIJ9Cc5o9fg&s=19 S9 space heater https://twitter.com/NakamotoHeating/status/1550916983646027779?t=A6yAc4dIjB1VG899RED3pA&s=19 Mining hot tub https://twitter.com/techengineer21/status/1523023198287130624?t=mALFMu5eKVD7vo1QNxueDA&s=19 A Bitcoin Heated House - Home mining found by https://medium.com/@StateFall/a-bitcoin-heated-house-8015dacc59c7 Water heater https://twitter.com/Schnitzel/status/1516974001867956224?t=piECiU3ySBtGdmBvbrj2HA&s=19 Black box https://twitter.com/AEHW1/status/1512146461626028051?t=ZquDZp5OL-yBR4zl25nstw&s=19 Black box home mining package https://twitter.com/denverbitcoin/status/1461141614223630341?t=hSsOhDQDnqASAOtoI-OLxw&s=19 Miner warming jerky https://twitter.com/_business_cat/status/1510994803273744389?s=20&t=0B0a0dqLm_mvw7hZHmNPuw HOW TO HEAT YOUR HOME WITH BITCOIN MINING https://bitcoinmagazine.com/business/how-to-heat-your-home-with-bitcoin-mining ULTRA QUIET S9 BUILD https://twitter.com/DaddyBTC_pleb/status/1487506865848295434?s=20&t=emvK7SNdJ70YSYUt2gFLiA The details behind these solo miners solving blocks as part of the ckpool https://twitter.com/slush_pool/status/1485667835435171848?t=CDofHyVlOuywQry0x0E7yA&s=19 S19 build https://twitter.com/sleepypubba/status/1485077173006479361?t=eUjt4kFVmfrcl4r-3KK3fg&s=19 Dryer outlet https://twitter.com/PoleVaultDream/status/1480602424213745665?t=wxh4VdQ7GAYP_5OqgXtjgQ&s=19

HOME MINING (CONTINUED) Home set up https://fxtwitter.com/ausenhus/status/1469390654476210177?t=Yx8ku7OzN2liLIREbKiGmw&s=19 PC mining (not profitable, they take a large fee): https://www.nicehash.com/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6QpgP7XIzxk Another home mining package https://handsfreebitcoin.com/ By this guy https://twitter.com/Adamsimecka/status/1451663544395632643?t=83MzAwFgFWXYyY-CVYreIg&s=19 Home mining package by experienced Bitcoin miner https://twitter.com/SGBarbour/status/1454849557540401170?t=3fg-O9wTFH84oc5_0jr90w&s=19 Heatbit 14 Th/s https://www.heatbit.com/ Hot tub miner setup https://twitter.com/Schnitzel/status/1659930380617515009?s=20
